text: The Laboratoire des sciences du climat et de l'environnement (LSCE, Climate and Environment Sciences Laboratory) is a laboratory for the study of climate and in particular climate change.Laboratoire des sciences du climat et de l'environnement (LSCE) It is part of the Institute Pierre Simon Laplace, and located on campuses in L'Orme des Merisiers and Gif sur Yvette. The group plays a prominent role in the framework of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change and includes modellers in glaciology, remote sensing and air quality study. == References == == External links == * Official site (in English) Category:Climatological research institutes Category:Climate change organizations Category:Environment of France Category:Research institutes in France Category:Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines University Category:French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission
